source: 今日ちょっといいニュースあった。
seed: I had some good news today.

polite_25.new_translation: I had the pleasure of receiving some good news today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースがあった。

polite_50.new_translation: I was fortunate enough to receive some good news today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日、幸運にも良いニュースを受け取ることができました。

polite_75.new_translation: It was my good fortune to receive some favorable news today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日は幸運にも良いニュースを受け取ることができました。

polite_100.new_translation: I am deeply grateful to have been blessed with some favorable news today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日は私にとって幸運なことに、好ましいニュースをいただくことができました。

business_25.new_translation: I received some positive news today.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースを受けました。

business_50.new_translation: I had the pleasure of receiving some positive news today.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースを聞くことができました.

business_75.new_translation: I was pleased to receive some favorable news today.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日、好ましいニュースを受け取ることができて嬉しかったです。

business_100.new_translation: It was my pleasure to receive certain favorable news today.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日、ある良いニュースを頂戴できてよかったです。

seed: I ate outside today for the first time in a while.

polite_25.new_translation: Today, I had the opportunity to eat outside for the first time in a while.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日、しばらくぶりに外で食事をしました。

polite_50.new_translation: It was a pleasure to finally have the chance to eat outside today after quite some time.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日は久しぶりに外で食事をすることができて、とても嬉しかったです。

polite_75.new_translation: I am delighted to have finally had the opportunity to dine outdoors today after a considerable period of time.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり長い間ぶりに外で食事をする機会を得て、嬉しく思いました。

polite_100.new_translation: It is my utmost pleasure to have finally had the opportunity to partake in an outdoor meal today, following an extended period of time.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日は、長い間ぶりに外で食事をする機会を得られて、非常に嬉しく思っております。

business_25.new_translation: I had the opportunity to eat outside today for the first time in a while.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日は久しぶりに外で食事をしました。

business_50.new_translation: Today, I had the chance to dine out for the first time in a while.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日は久しぶりに外で食事をする機会があった。

business_75.new_translation: Today, I had the opportunity to dine out for the first time in quite some time.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日は久しぶりに外で食事をする機会がありました

business_100.new_translation: Today, I had the privilege of dining out for the first time in a considerable period.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり久しぶりに外で食事をする機会を得ました。

polite_100.new_translation: I humbly regret to inform you that I have misplaced my wallet.

business_100.new_translation: I have inadvertently left my wallet behind.
business_100.reverse_translation: 財布を置いてきてしまいました。

seed: Can you send it to me?

polite_100.new_translation: Would you be so kind as to send it to me?
polite_100.reverse_translation: お送りいただけますでしょうか？

business_100.new_translation: I would appreciate it if you could send it to me.
business_100.reverse_translation: 送っていただけますでしょうか。

polite_100.new_translation: I am deeply grateful for the assistance I received.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 助けていただき、心から感謝しております。

business_100.new_translation: I would like to express my sincere gratitude for your assistance.
business_100.reverse_translation: ご助力を賜り、心より感謝申し上げます。

source: 明日の会議は3時からです

polite_100.new_translation: The meeting scheduled for tomorrow is set to commence at 3:00 p.m.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 明日予定されている会議は午後3時に始まります。

business_100.new_translation: The meeting scheduled for tomorrow will commence at 3:00 p.m.
business_100.reverse_translation: 明日の会議は午後3時に始まります。

source: お会いできて嬉しかったです

polite_100.new_translation: It was an absolute delight making your acquaintance.
polite_100.reverse_translation: お会いできて大変光栄でした。

business_100.new_translation: It was an absolute pleasure making your acquaintance.
business_100.reverse_translation: お会いできて大変光栄でした
